input.sentences: we went to a music festival in the park and the children had fun feeding the birds .
there were many instruments including a piano to play .
we sat on our blanket and enjoyed the live music .
this lady was very good at playing the guitar .
the event had a huge turnout of people | it was a great success .
output.sentences: There was music at the park yesterday.
They even had a piano for people to play.
It was a beautiful day to sit and listen to the concert.
I loved the lady who played the guitar.
There was a large crowd at the park.
